'''Mythcon 17''' was the seventeenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Daughters of Beatrice: Women in Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Charles de Lint]] (fantasy author) and Judith Kollmann (Williams scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Sarah Beach and Peter Lowentrout
